comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Presumably Helen Dorothea Kane (2 Aug 1886-1938) who was born in Bar Harbor, Maine and married Seymour Johnson on 17 Feb 1916 (aminports3.blogspot.ch/2012/02/mundy-ethel-frances-portra...). A report about the wedding is in The New York Times, February 18, 1916

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks, B-59, we can add her name to the record.
